law.text: The commissioner shall have the authority to make and enforce such reasonable rules and regulations as may be necessary to make effective the provisions of this subtitle and to establish the manner in which licensees shall conduct their business, but such rules and regulations shall not be contrary to nor inconsistent with the provisions of this subtitle.
law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1412, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 301, subtit. 30, sec. 7, effective June 18, 1970.
